```{r Library Setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```
## R Markdown
```{r Reading, Cleaning, and Mutating Subway Data, echo = FALSE}
subway_data = read_csv(file = "./NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv")
cleaned_subway_data = janitor::clean_names(subway_data)
selected_subway_data = select(cleaned_subway_data, line, station_name, station_latitude, station_longitude, route1:route11, entry, vending, entrance_type, ada) %>% mutate(logical_entry = recode(entry, "YES" = TRUE, "NO" = FALSE)) 
as.tibble(selected_subway_data)
names(selected_subway_data)
